caption.p: Structures of dual BuChE/IDO1, ChE/PARP-1, and ChE/PDE inhibitors. While structure 22 is inspired by Miconazole, Olaparib has been taken as the reference structure in the synthesis of MTDL 23, while Donepezil and Rivastigmine, coupled with the pyrazolopyrimidinone structure of a known PDE9A inhibitor led to the identification of compounds with general structures 24 and 25.
